A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film finally gives the prequel movies competition for the Worst Star Wars film of the franchise\, and it's all thanks to a pointless\, inconsequential plot\, piss-poor character development\, and \"shocking twists\" thrown in for the sake of subverting expectations that were built up from the previous film. This is a directionless\, sub-par mess of a film which only shows how nauseating the Disney ride is going to get\, and we better drink the kool-aid and buy our Porg toys and shut up\, because the critics mysteriously all agree\, it's the film of the year.
